Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. safety_features.text: [{'url': 'https://www.carandbike.com/mahindra-cars/xuv-3xo/safety-rating', 'content': "Mahindra XUV 3XO Safety Ratings: Global / Bharat NCAP - carndbike Bharat Ncap Crash Test Mahindra XUV 3XO XUV 3XO Safety Rating Mileage Price Specs Features Colors Images News Reviews FAQs EMI Mahindra XUV 3XO Safety Rating 5 29.36 / 32.00 Adult 5 43.00/ 49.00 Child Tested By Bharat Ncap Adult 5 Child 5 Body Type SUV (2 rows) Year of Testing 2024 Crash Test Weight 1737 Mahindras sub-compact SUV, the XUV 3XO, has set a new benchmark in vehicle safety by earning a 5-star rating in Bharat NCAPs crash tests. The XUV 3XO secured this accolade for both adult and child occupant protection, underlining Mahindras focus on providing world-class safety features in its vehicles. This latest recognition comes on the heels of Bharat NCAP's recent safety assessments of other prominent SUVs, including Tata models and the Citroen Basalt, as well as Mahindras own Thar Roxx and XUV 400 EV, both of which also earned 5-star ratings. The XUV 3XO demonstrated strong safety performance in multiple areas of testing. It achieved a remarkable total score of 29.36 out of 32 for adult occupant protection. In the frontal offset deformable barrier test, the SUV exhibited excellent protection for the co-driver, with good ratings across all body regions. However, the driver's chest, legs, and feet received ratings of adequate to marginal due to the impact forces recorded during the collision. Despite these minor deductions, protection to the driver's head, hip, and thigh was rated as good, reinforcing the XUV 3XOs overall structural integrity and crashworthiness. The XUV 3XO excelled in the side barrier and pole impact tests, securing a full 16 out of 16 points . These tests assess the SUVs ability to protect front-seat occupants in scenarios where side impacts pose a significant threat. Mahindras engineering expertise was evident, as the SUV delivered comprehensive protection to the head, chest, abdomen, and pelvis, showcasing its robust design and stringent safety standards. In terms of child occupant safety, the XUV 3XO also performed admirably, earning a total score of 43 out of 49 . While the SUV dropped a few points in the vehicle assessment score, it still received full marks in both the dynamic crash test and the child restraint system (CRS) parameters. The test evaluated the ability of child restraint systems to effectively secure young passengers during high-impact situations. The XUV 3XO accommodated CRS installations with ease, ensuring full protection for child passengers. Bharat NCAP tested both the fully loaded AX7 L variant and the entry-level MX2 variant of the XUV 3XO. The safety ratings are applicable across all variants, reflecting Mahindras commitment to offering consistent safety standards, regardless of trim level. The XUV 3XOs impressive safety performance is backed by a comprehensive suite of standard safety features. The SUV comes equipped with six airbags as a standard offering across all trims, ensuring superior protection for all occupants. Additionally, Electronic Stability Control (ESC) and Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) are standard, enhancing the vehicles stability and control in various driving conditions. Seat belt reminders are also provided for all seating positions, encouraging passengers to use seat belts at all times and thereby boosting overall safety. For customers opting for the higher-end variants, Mahindra offers Level 2 Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) . This package includes features such as adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, and autonomous emergency braking, adding another layer of safety and convenience for drivers. These technologies are designed to mitigate the risk of collisions and assist drivers in maintaining optimal control over the vehicle. The XUV 3XOs success in the Bharat NCAP crash tests is a testament to Mahindras dedication to vehicle safety. final_report.detailed:
Let me think through this: 

**Mahindra XUV 3XO: A Comprehensive Analysis of Features, Luxury, and Safety**

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a compact SUV designed to compete in the competitive Indian automotive market. This report provides a detailed analysis of its general features, luxury elements, and safety aspects, highlighting its strengths and weaknesses.

**1. General Features**

The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a range of general features that make it a versatile choice for urban and adventurous drivers alike. These include:

*   **Engine Options:** The XUV 3XO offers both petrol and diesel engine options to cater to different driving preferences. The petrol variant features a 1.2L Turbocharged engine, while the diesel variant is equipped with a 1.5L engine.  A TGDi (Turbo Gasoline Direct injection) version of the petrol engine is also available, offering higher power output.
*   **Dimensions:** With a length of 3990 mm, a width of 1821 mm, and a wheelbase of 2600 mm, the XUV 3XO provides a spacious cabin while maintaining maneuverability in urban settings.  It has a ground clearance of 201mm, making it suitable for various terrains.
*   **Infotainment System:** The XUV 3XO is equipped with a 10.25-inch touchscreen infotainment system with navigation, Apple CarPlay, and Android Auto compatibility.  The Harman Kardon audio system with 7 speakers ensures an immersive sound experience.
*   **Ground Clearance:** The vehicle offers an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, which enhances its ability to handle different terrains effectively.

**Strengths:**

*   **Versatile Engine Options:** The availability of both petrol and diesel engines allows customers to choose according to their preference and driving needs.
*   **Spacious Cabin:** Despite its compact size, the XUV 3XO offers a reasonably spacious cabin, making it comfortable for passengers.
*   **Advanced Infotainment System:** The integration of a large touchscreen, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, and a premium audio system enhances the overall driving experience.

**Weaknesses:**

*   **Boot Space:** The boot space might be limited compared to some of its competitors, which could be a concern for those requiring more luggage capacity.

**2. Luxury Elements**

The XUV 3XO incorporates several luxury elements that enhance the comfort and convenience of the vehicle. These features include:

*   **Premium Interior Materials:** The interior features premium leatherette seats, soft-touch materials on the dashboard and door trims, and a cooled glovebox with illumination. 
*   **Skyroof:** The Skyroof adds an airy feel to the cabin, enhancing the overall ambiance and providing a more open experience. 
*   **Comfort and Convenience:** The vehicle includes features such as a cooled glovebox, passive keyless entry, a front armrest with storage, and a console with a cup holder. 
*   **Advanced Technology:** The XUV 3XO includes a wireless charger, 65W USB-C fast charging, and a digital instrument cluster.  The ADRENOX Connect technology allows remote access to various functions and real-time vehicle information.

**Strengths:**

*   **Premium Interior:** The use of high-quality materials and thoughtful design elements creates a luxurious and comfortable cabin environment.
*   **Skyroof:** The Skyroof is a standout feature that enhances the overall sense of space and luxury inside the car.
*   **Advanced Technology:** Features such as wireless charging and connected car technology add to the convenience and sophistication of the vehicle.

**Weaknesses:**

*   **Cost of Luxury Features:** Some of the luxury features are only available in higher-end variants, making them less accessible to budget-conscious buyers.

**3. Safety Aspects**

Safety is a key priority in the Mahindra XUV 3XO, with a range of active and passive safety features. These include:

*   **Bharat NCAP Rating:** The XUV 3XO has achieved a 5-star rating in Bharat NCAP crash tests, demonstrating its commitment to vehicle safety. 
*   **Airbags:** The SUV comes equipped with six airbags as a standard offering across all trims, ensuring superior protection for all occupants.
*   **Electronic Stability Control (ESC) and Anti-lock Braking System (ABS):** These features enhance the vehicles stability and control in various driving conditions.
*   **Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS):** Higher-end variants offer Level 2 ADAS, including adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, and autonomous emergency braking. 

**Strengths:**

*   **High Safety Rating:** The 5-star Bharat NCAP rating is a significant selling point, providing peace of mind to potential buyers.
*   **Standard Safety Features:** The inclusion of six airbags, ESC, and ABS as standard across all variants demonstrates Mahindras commitment to safety.
*   **ADAS Features:** The availability of Level 2 ADAS in higher variants adds an extra layer of safety and convenience.

**Weaknesses:**

*   **Availability of ADAS:** The ADAS features are limited to higher-end variants, meaning that buyers on a budget may miss out on these advanced safety technologies.

**Overall Assessment**

The Mahindra XUV 3XO presents a compelling package in the compact SUV segment. Its key strengths lie in its versatile engine options, spacious cabin, premium interior, high safety rating, and advanced technology features. Potential weaknesses include limited boot space and the cost of luxury and ADAS features, which may not be accessible to all buyers. The vehicle's recent 5-star Bharat NCAP rating and available Level 2 ADAS significantly enhance its appeal, making it a strong contender in its class.

To provide a balanced perspective, the XUV 3XO must be compared with its competitors in terms of pricing, features, and performance. This analysis should also consider the target audience and their specific needs and preferences. Overall, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is a well-rounded SUV that offers a blend of comfort, convenience, safety, and performance, making it a worthwhile consideration for those in the market for a compact SUV.

The 3X factor - The XUV 3X0 is a bonanza of offering with thrice the excitement and exuberance from the house of Mahindra. Mumbai, April 04, 2024: Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd., Indias leading SUV manufacturer, today unveiled the name of its much-anticipated SUV, the XUV 3XO (pronounced as XUV-three-exoh ). Its global debut on April 29 will set a new precedent in the category, embodying the sophistication and modern technology that the XUV brand DNA is celebrated for. Engineered to deliver "Everything you want & more," the XUV 3XO embodies the essence of a truly standout Mahindra SUV. It seamlessly integrates thrilling performance, cutting-edge technology, unmissable design, and unparalleled safety to cater to the aspirations of urban drivers. With triple the appeal in each journey it surpasses expectations in all facets of SUV ownership. The XUV 3XO resonates with the ambitions of those on the rise, its name playfully mirroring the executive heights denoted by "CXO". With its segment-leading features, this SUV is for those who demand excellence in every aspect of their lives. The new XUV 3XO will be manufactured at the companys manufacturing facility in Nashik, Maharashtra. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. News Latest Cars Latest Bikes Scooters Comparisons Auto Finance News Latest Cars Latest Bikes Scooters Comparisons Auto Finance Facebook Twitter Youtube Instagram Latest Cars Mahindra XUV 3XO: The Game-Changer SUV You Cant Ignore in 2025 June 1, 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: If youre on the hunt for a stylish, tech-packed, and safety-first compact SUV, the Mahindra XUV 3XO (formerly known as the XUV300) deserves your attention. Launched in 2024, this refreshed model brings a bold design, advanced features, and impressive performance to the tableall while keeping your budget in mind. Lets take a closer look at what makes the XUV 3XO a standout choice in its segment. Table of Contents Toggle Mahindra XUV 3XO Launch Date Mahindra XUV 3XO Design and Build Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine and Mileage Mahindra XUV 3XO Features and Technology Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior Mahindra XUV 3XO Safety Features Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications Table Mahindra XUV 3XO On-Road Price FAQs Mahindra XUV 3XO Launch Date Mahindra officially launched the XUV 3XO in April 2024, marking a significant update to its predecessor, the XUV300. This new model isnt just a facelift; its a comprehensive overhaul that introduces a fresh design, enhanced features, and improved performance. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mahindra XUV 3XO (@mahindraxuv3xo) Since its debut, the XUV 3XO has garnered attention for its value-packed offerings, positioning itself as a strong contender in the compact SUV market. With a range of variants and features, it caters to a wide audience looking for a blend of style, comfort, and technology. Also Read Mahindra XUV 3XO Design and Build The XUV 3XO sports a bold and athletic design that commands attention on the road. Its front grille with piano black finish, sleek LED headlamps, and infinity LED tail lamps contribute to its modern and aggressive look. The SUVs stance is further enhanced by R17 diamond-cut alloy wheels, giving it a premium feel. Built on a robust platform, the XUV 3XO offers a ground clearance of 201mm, ensuring it can handle various terrains with ease. Its dimensions3990mm in length, 1821mm in width, and a wheelbase of 2600mmprovide a spacious cabin while maintaining maneuverability in urban settings. Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine and Mileage Under the hood, the XUV 3XO offers multiple engine options to suit different driving preferences. The petrol variant features a 1.2L Turbocharged engine delivering 82 kW @ 5000 rpm and 200 Nm of torque @ 1500-3500 rpm. For those seeking more power, the TGDi engine variant offers 96 kW @ 5000 rpm and 230 Nm of torque @ 1500-3750 rpm. On the diesel front, the 1.5L engine produces 85.8 kW @ 3750 rpm and 300 Nm of torque @ 1500-2500 rpm. These engines are paired with either a 6-speed manual or a 6-speed automatic transmission, providing flexibility for different driving styles. final_report.detailed:
Let me think through this: 

**Mahindra XUV 3XO: A Comprehensive Analysis of Features, Luxury, and Safety**

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a compact SUV designed to compete in the competitive Indian automotive market. This report provides a detailed analysis of its general features, luxury elements, and safety aspects, highlighting its strengths and weaknesses.

**1. General Features**

The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a range of general features that make it a versatile choice for urban and adventurous drivers alike. These include:

*   **Engine Options:** The XUV 3XO offers both petrol and diesel engine options to cater to different driving preferences. The petrol variant features a 1.2L Turbocharged engine, while the diesel variant is equipped with a 1.5L engine.  A TGDi (Turbo Gasoline Direct injection) version of the petrol engine is also available, offering higher power output.
*   **Dimensions:** With a length of 3990 mm, a width of 1821 mm, and a wheelbase of 2600 mm, the XUV 3XO provides a spacious cabin while maintaining maneuverability in urban settings.  It has a ground clearance of 201mm, making it suitable for various terrains.
*   **Infotainment System:** The XUV 3XO is equipped with a 10.25-inch touchscreen infotainment system with navigation, Apple CarPlay, and Android Auto compatibility.  The Harman Kardon audio system with 7 speakers ensures an immersive sound experience.
*   **Ground Clearance:** The vehicle offers an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, which enhances its ability to handle different terrains effectively.

**Strengths:**

*   **Versatile Engine Options:** The availability of both petrol and diesel engines allows customers to choose according to their preference and driving needs.
*   **Spacious Cabin:** Despite its compact size, the XUV 3XO offers a reasonably spacious cabin, making it comfortable for passengers.
*   **Advanced Infotainment System:** The integration of a large touchscreen, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, and a premium audio system enhances the overall driving experience.

**Weaknesses:**

*   **Boot Space:** The boot space might be limited compared to some of its competitors, which could be a concern for those requiring more luggage capacity.

**2. Luxury Elements**

The XUV 3XO incorporates several luxury elements that enhance the comfort and convenience of the vehicle. These features include:

*   **Premium Interior Materials:** The interior features premium leatherette seats, soft-touch materials on the dashboard and door trims, and a cooled glovebox with illumination. 
*   **Skyroof:** The Skyroof adds an airy feel to the cabin, enhancing the overall ambiance and providing a more open experience. 
*   **Comfort and Convenience:** The vehicle includes features such as a cooled glovebox, passive keyless entry, a front armrest with storage, and a console with a cup holder. 
*   **Advanced Technology:** The XUV 3XO includes a wireless charger, 65W USB-C fast charging, and a digital instrument cluster.  The ADRENOX Connect technology allows remote access to various functions and real-time vehicle information.

**Strengths:**

*   **Premium Interior:** The use of high-quality materials and thoughtful design elements creates a luxurious and comfortable cabin environment.
*   **Skyroof:** The Skyroof is a standout feature that enhances the overall sense of space and luxury inside the car.
*   **Advanced Technology:** Features such as wireless charging and connected car technology add to the convenience and sophistication of the vehicle.

**Weaknesses:**

*   **Cost of Luxury Features:** Some of the luxury features are only available in higher-end variants, making them less accessible to budget-conscious buyers.

**3. Safety Aspects**

Safety is a key priority in the Mahindra XUV 3XO, with a range of active and passive safety features. These include:

*   **Bharat NCAP Rating:** The XUV 3XO has achieved a 5-star rating in Bharat NCAP crash tests, demonstrating its commitment to vehicle safety. 
*   **Airbags:** The SUV comes equipped with six airbags as a standard offering across all trims, ensuring superior protection for all occupants.
*   **Electronic Stability Control (ESC) and Anti-lock Braking System (ABS):** These features enhance the vehicles stability and control in various driving conditions.
*   **Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS):** Higher-end variants offer Level 2 ADAS, including adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, and autonomous emergency braking. 

**Strengths:**

*   **High Safety Rating:** The 5-star Bharat NCAP rating is a significant selling point, providing peace of mind to potential buyers.
*   **Standard Safety Features:** The inclusion of six airbags, ESC, and ABS as standard across all variants demonstrates Mahindras commitment to safety.
*   **ADAS Features:** The availability of Level 2 ADAS in higher variants adds an extra layer of safety and convenience.

**Weaknesses:**

*   **Availability of ADAS:** The ADAS features are limited to higher-end variants, meaning that buyers on a budget may miss out on these advanced safety technologies.

**Overall Assessment**

The Mahindra XUV 3XO presents a compelling package in the compact SUV segment. Its key strengths lie in its versatile engine options, spacious cabin, premium interior, high safety rating, and advanced technology features. Potential weaknesses include limited boot space and the cost of luxury and ADAS features, which may not be accessible to all buyers. The vehicle's recent 5-star Bharat NCAP rating and available Level 2 ADAS significantly enhance its appeal, making it a strong contender in its class.

To provide a balanced perspective, the XUV 3XO must be compared with its competitors in terms of pricing, features, and performance. This analysis should also consider the target audience and their specific needs and preferences. Overall, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is a well-rounded SUV that offers a blend of comfort, convenience, safety, and performance, making it a worthwhile consideration for those in the market for a compact SUV.
